about_the_game:
DEMO IS OUT NOW!! Attention, the Demo is Singleplayer, but the final game is still planned to be Online Coop!

This DEMO has a more suspenseful feel, showing a little bit of what the horror moments of the game will be like, but don't worry, there will be fun moments and intense shootings in the future!

In the past few weeks, people have started to act in a violent and uncontrolled way, doctors don't know how to explain what is happening and not even what to do to solve it. So. To save innocents lifes, people were hired to eliminate possible threats before it's too late.



You (and your friends) were hired to "wipe" the isolated places where such threats exist. You must find all the infected present in the area and exterminate them with your weapons, but, unfortunately, it will not be that simple, puzzles and scares will be the main obstacles in these searches.

This game will feature different maps, all divided into parts for better gameplay.

Features

  • Singleplayer / Campaign Mode
  • Online Coop With Friends / Campaign Mode (best mode)

Both modes consist of:

  • Find keys (sometimes..);
  • Find the infected (before they find you);
  • Solve puzzles (to find the keys... or not too);
  • Kill the infected;
  • Scare friends
  • Get scared;
  • Aaaand, the most importantly, break lamps have fun.[/]

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not suitable for all ages: Violence and detailed violence.

detailed_description:
DEMO IS OUT NOW!! Attention, the Demo is Singleplayer, but the final game is still planned to be Online Coop!

This DEMO has a more suspenseful feel, showing a little bit of what the horror moments of the game will be like, but don't worry, there will be fun moments and intense shootings in the future!

In the past few weeks, people have started to act in a violent and uncontrolled way, doctors don't know how to explain what is happening and not even what to do to solve it. So. To save innocents lifes, people were hired to eliminate possible threats before it's too late.



You (and your friends) were hired to "wipe" the isolated places where such threats exist. You must find all the infected present in the area and exterminate them with your weapons, but, unfortunately, it will not be that simple, puzzles and scares will be the main obstacles in these searches.

name: WipeOuters

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: i5 4th generation
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 650 2GB or equivalent / Video Cards with Vulkan API and 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600AF
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6GB or equivalent / Video Cards with Vulkan API
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: A first-person game that mix horror and action, where you and your friends must "wipe" the houses finding all the infected in the area before they find you.
supported_languages:
English, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support
